question.text:
The pair having the same magnetic moment is:

At. No. :Cr=24, Mn=25, Fe=26, Co=27

solution.text:
The compounds having the same number of unpaired electrons will have same magnetic moment.

Magnetic moment μ = nn+2

where n is the number of unpaired electrons

[ Cr ( H 2 O ) 6 ] +2

C r 2+ .(3 d 4 )  with weak field ligand so unpaired electrons are 4

So, μ= 44+2 = 24

F e +2 ( 3 d 6 ) Weak field ligand so unpaired electrons are 4

μ = 44+2 = 24
